short_summary: Electric Motor Drive Stockpicker Forklift Trucks
description: For information, please contact the contracting authority:\
full_summary:
---------------

### Electric Motor Drive Stockpicker Forklift Trucks

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006831
**Solicitation Number:** W8476-236638/A
**Date of Publication:** September 13, 2022
**Closing Date:** October 5, 2022, at 14:00

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence invites suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement (RFSA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL to participate in this bid solicitation process. The requirement is for the supply of 9 units of Electric Motor Drive Stockpicker Forklift Trucks and associated items, as per Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL, Group 5, Configuration C, Mast 3.

#### Delivery Requirements

Delivery of the goods must take place within 120 days after the contract award.

#### Solicitation Details

- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- **Regions of Opportunity:**
	+ Canada
- **Regions of Delivery:**
	+ Canada
- **Contact Information:**
	+ Address: National Defence Headquarters, Director Land Procurement (DLP) 5-3-4-6
	+ Email: genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

#### Pre-Qualification

Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified for the RFSA may refer to the following link: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868).

#### Documents

Documents related to this solicitation may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Suppliers must comply with any additional requirements outlined in the RFSA.

#### Notes

- This solicitation is open only to suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement (RFSA) under the Request E60HS-21FRKL.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Contact

For further information, please contact Genevieve Roach at genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca or by visiting the Buyandsell.gc.ca website. [^1]


### End

[^1]: This entry has been rewritten and rephrased to improve its clarity and coherence,
